TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter extends System.Object implements class System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter
Public NotInheritable Class JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter Implements IMultiValueConverter

summary.span: 可將向後瀏覽記錄和向前瀏覽記錄 (由 或 公開) 合併為單一的 Windows Internet Explorer 7 樣式導覽功能表。

span.span: merges navigation back history and navigation forward history (as exposed by or ) into a single, Windows Internet Explorer 7-style navigation menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩者和顯示支援使用下列機制的歷程記錄巡覽的巡覽組件區塊：Both and display navigation chrome that supports history navigation using the following mechanisms: - 瀏覽 按鈕後一段內容一次。A button for navigating back one piece of content at a time. - 向前巡覽一項的內容一次按鈕。A button for navigating forward one piece of content at a time. - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-樣式下拉式清單會顯示：An [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style drop-down list that shows: - 合併的最多 9 個項目清單重新瀏覽歷程記錄和向前巡覽記錄中的九個項目最多。A combined list of up to nine items in back navigation history and up to nine items in forward navigation history. - 目前的一段後和向前巡覽記錄的內容位置。The position of the current piece of content with respect to both back and forward navigation history. 瀏覽歷程記錄會儲存這兩和中下列屬性：The navigation history is stored by both and in the following properties: **後巡覽記錄**: ， 。**Back Navigation History**: , . **巡覽歷程記錄**: ， 。**Forward Navigation History**: , . 若要建立[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-樣式下拉式清單中，並使用合併其個別的向後巡覽歷程記錄和向前巡覽記錄成單一清單的巡覽歷程記錄項目。To create the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style drop-down list, and use to merge their individual back navigation history and forward navigation history into a single list of navigation history entries. 結果清單會包含最多 9 個項目從向後巡覽歷程記錄以及最多 9 個項目從向前巡覽記錄，再加上目前的內容項目。The resulting list contains up to nine entries from back navigation history and up to nine entries from forward navigation history, plus an entry for the current content. 如果您建立自訂的瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，而且必須提供[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-樣式下拉式清單中，您可以使用類似的效果。If you create custom navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], and need to provide an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style drop-down list, you can use to similar effect. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage 此類別通常不會使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This class is not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建構以文字為基礎的瀏覽歷程記錄 功能表。The following example shows how to construct a text-based navigation history menu. 使用 [] 功能表結合 [上一頁] 和 [向前巡覽歷程記錄所裝載導覽器]。The menu uses to combine both the back and forward navigation histories of the hosted navigator. [!code-xaml[JournalEntryUnifiedPositionConverterSnippets#JournalEntryUnifiedPositionConverterWithMenuXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JournalEntryUnifiedPositionConverterSnippets/CS/mainwindow.xaml#journalentryunifiedpositionconverterwithmenuxaml)]

span.span: An array of two navigation stacks.

summary.span: 合併兩個巡覽記錄堆疊。

returns.span: ，可用來列舉巡覽記錄堆疊的合併清單，如果沒有傳遞任何的巡覽堆疊則為 。

span.span: An that can be used to enumerate the merged list of navigation history stacks if neither passed navigation stack is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對，瀏覽堆疊所提供的下列屬性：For , the navigation stacks are available from the following properties: - - 針對，瀏覽堆疊所提供的下列屬性：For , the navigation stacks are available from the following properties: - 兩個傳遞的巡覽堆疊會結合成單一的巡覽堆疊，其中包含最多每個巡覽堆疊中的九個項目加上目前的項目。The two passed navigation stacks are combined into a single navigation stack that contains up to nine items from each navigation stack plus the current item. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage 這個類別的成員不常使用中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或不能用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定項目是在向後巡覽記錄、向前巡覽記錄，或巡覽器的目前內容中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether an entry is in back navigation history, forward navigation history, or is the current content of a navigator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得單一從 [導覽器] 的物件 (， )，呼叫**RemoveBackEntry**: ， ， 。To get a single object from a navigator (, ), call **RemoveBackEntry**: , , . 若要取得所有物件從，列舉所傳回的項目和。To get all objects from a , enumerate the entries that are returned by and . 若要取得所有物件從，列舉所傳回的項目和。To get all objects from a , enumerate the entries that are returned by and . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage 這個類別的成員不常使用中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或不能用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
